name: Cemetery Warrior 6
summary: Cemetery Warrior 6 is a dynamic 3D shooter from the first person, with incendiary Heavy Metal

name: Celestial
summary:
Celestial is an open-world space survival game playing on a spherical planet.

It's the year 2542 and you play in the role of an Astronaut who is tasked with testing the first Warp drive created by Humankind,
but after a chain of events, you end up getting sucked into a black hole and teleported to an unknown part of the universe.

Now it is up to you to survive against various roaming alien creaturs, encounter a dangerous environment with sand storms, hurling tornados, and radioactive clouds.

name: Celeste Classic 2: Lani's Trek
summary: A Pico-8 platformer about hiking around a mountain, made in three days for Celeste's third anniversary.

name: Cellscape
summary: Experience life as a microbe in a dynamic, living ecosystem. Hunt bacteria, dodge hazards and predators, and divide as many times as you can!

name: Cemetery Warrior 4
summary: The game immerses you in the chaotic gameplay under Heavy Metal. Shoot crowds of various monsters whose variety of AI is amazing: There are jumping monsters and earthworms, monsters shooting with spikes, monsters that run along walls, huge fiery demons and mighty titans.

name: Celeste Blue Wizard Luna
summary: Help Luna form a resistance to take down Princess Lucia the Black Witch and free the skyborne land of Jupiterno from her tyranny!

name: C.E.O.
summary: C.E.O. is a game about management training, with features such as stocks and subsidiaries.

name: Cellmount: Automata
summary: We believe that these puzzles portray the nature of fundamental physics with high accuracy!

name: Celeste: Farewell
summary: Chapter 9: Farewell is a new story chapter for Celeste. It contains 100+ new levels, bringing the game's total to over 800! Over 40 minutes of new music from Lena Raine. There's several brand new mechanics and items to discover and play with. Reconnect with beloved characters for a final goodbye.

name: Cellbreak
summary: In 2062, twenty years after a treaty legalized human cloning for organ harvesting, in Vitacorp's mega factory an incubator malfunctions and a boy pops out. Opening his eyes for the first time he is Overwhelmed by the sight and pure size of the mega factory. The boy succumbs to his instincts: ESCAPE!

name: Celtic Heroes
summary: Are you looking for that classic MMORPG vibe? Whether you're a minmaxer strategizing every detail for maximum efficiency, a savvy fashion collector in search of the most stunning outfits, or even someone who enjoys the journey of casual leveling, Celtic Heroes opens its gates to you!

name: Celebrities Hacked: Evelyn Photo Pack
summary: Evelyn, once known as the sexiest woman on the silver screen, now a formidable TV producer. Her relentless interviews often reveal more than her guests anticipate. Off-screen, she delves into yoga, finding tranquility amidst chaos. Would you dare to join her for a yoga session?

name: Cell Defender
summary: It's time to take on a new front. A microscopic one!

name: Celeste
summary: Help Madeline survive her inner demons on her journey to the top of Celeste Mountain, in this super-tight platformer from the creators of TowerFall. Brave hundreds of hand-crafted challenges, uncover devious secrets, and piece together the mystery of the mountain.

name: Celestial City Fantasy
summary: Celestial City Fantasy is a 3D simulation management game developed with Unreal Engine 5. In the game, you will manage a sky city, construct various buildings, and receive visiting tourists and adventurers through airships, allowing them to live and grow in your city.

name: Cerberus: Orbital watch
summary: Get ready for classic top down space shooter gameplay! In near future scientists detected allien signals, you need to find out their nature.

name: Cellz
summary:
Arcade Mode: Challenge up to 3 of your friends in different arenas in this unique and colorful experience and be the very best invader!

Cellz simulates the journey of a bacterium in the human body where your only goal is to successfully destroy all the organism, one organ at a time!

name: Ceress and Orea
summary: Ceress is sentenced to death, because she's in love with the 'wrong' person. But stubborn as she is, she calls out to an old deity, demanding a chance to change this unrighteousness. Can Ceress overcome death to be reunited with the woman she loves?

name: Ceilings
summary: A bite-sized horror text-adventure game for the Bite-Sized Horror Text Game Jam.

name: Centipede: Recharged
summary: The original bug-blasting arcade game is back! Centipede: Recharged has been reimagined for modern gameplay, with vibrant visuals designed for modern screens, a 16:9 field of play, and an original soundtrack from award-winning video game composer Megan McDuffee. Aim for a high score in the old school arcade mode and earn bragging rights with your name at the top of the leaderboard. Or test your skills and rank on the boards in one of 30 intensely creative challenges, which twist the gameplay in new and exciting ways. A dozen new power-ups can give you an edge by introducing abilities like screen-clearing explosions, rail guns, and even slowing down time. Every mode and level is playable in local co-op mode with a friend.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Zealot Pack
summary:
Bring out the fear in the eyes of your enemies with the Zealot Pack - an ultimate set dedicated to worshippers in need of extra style and experience!

This pack includes :
An Epic Dragon Skin for the Windguard
An Epic Dragon Skin for the Marauder
2,000 Gems
A full epic outfit for the Phantom
A Legendary helmet for the Windguard
A Legendary helmet for the Marauder
An Epic weapon for the Windguard
An Epic weapon for the Marauder
A 14-day xp booster
2 banners, player titles, profile wallpapers and player icons

name: Central Intelligence
summary: Central Intelligence is the ultimate test of your strategic skills. In this CIA style mission you can operate in three areas, Propaganda, Military, and Political, to achieve your objectives.

name: Celebrity Kombat
summary: Celebrity Kombat offers you a unique chance to fight as or against your favorite (or not) personality. With a diverse roster of characters, each with special abilities, prepare to battle in arenas filled with flair, humor, and audacity. Are you ready to settle the score? Join the ultimate showdown!

name: Cereus
summary:
In the crowded genre of tower defense, Cereus has been hailed as unique, refreshing, clean, simple to control, and easy to learn. Best described as a cross between Tower Defense, Geometry Wars, and Asteroids, Cereus feels like a retro game with modern touches. 
 
With challenging gameplay and satisfyingly difficult bosses, you'll need to rely on quick strategy and fast fingers. A skill grid provides gratifying progression that emphasizes versatility rather than increased power, requiring increasingly strategic gameplay on your road to victory.

name: Celeste: Crossover Collab
summary: A mod for popular Platforming game Celeste with levels based on many other game franchises

name: Celestian Tales: Old North - Howl of the Ravager
summary: Howl of the Ravager sheds light to events which took place more than twenty years before Celestian Tales: Old North. Glimpse upon the life of young Severin Leroux and witness his first steps to become a hero of the realm.

name: Celeste Classic
summary: A hardcore platform game for the PICO-8 fantasy console.

name: Cell War
summary: Cell War is a shareware strategy game that can be played against either the computer of another human player. It is a turn based game; when each player has completed their turn the game board is updated. When both players pass the game is over and the score is calculated with the winner being the player with the highest average number of cells throughout the game.

name: Cell Scientist: Beyond
summary: An exciting puzzle game with 50 levels story mode and easy to pick gameplay mechanics. Embark on an adventure to destroy viruses using futuristics nano ships and help the patients. Save the day using your puzzle-solving skills!

name: Cereal O's
summary: Cereal O's is a breakfast themed 2D indie platformer inspired by titles like Wario Land: Shake It, Wario Land 4, Pizza Tower, and Antonblast. developed by Yiannu duckis!

name: Celestial Mechanica
summary: Celestial Mechanica is a Flash-based platformer by Roger Hicks and Paul Veer. Celestial Mechanica delivers a mixture of action, puzzle, exploration and adventure while sporting the awesome "pixely-goodness" you've come to expect from Paul Veer and "sexy ear candy" from Roger Hicks.

name: Cerebral
summary: Cerebral is a psychological horror game where every mistake hurts your memory. Save your mind... or lose it to the system.

name: Ceramic Soul
summary: Within a Victorian manor, wake up as Yu, a porcelain doll, modeled to look like The Mother’s perfect daughter. Solve puzzles with the help of a detachable hand, hide from grievous threats, explore the manor, and search for your past to reclaim pieces of your soul and claim your freedom.

name: Celebrity Slot Machine
summary: Celebrity Slot Machine is a single player quick-play game that is fun for all the family - keeping Vegas-style slots in a fun and safe way for all.

name: Celestial Return
summary: Celestial Return is a story-driven RPG where dice are your bullets, your bribes, and your last breath. Loot, gamble, and survive a reality-crumbling city. Uncover cosmic horrors, outwit corrupted megacorps, and pray your next roll isn't your last.

name: Celebrities Hacked
summary: Celebrities Hacked' takes you on a mesmerizing journey that pairs the familiar excitement of classic Qix and Xonix games with an innovative, bold twist. Here, your skills and reflexes are rewarded with a gallery of art that peels back the curtain on some of the most alluring celebrities. As you navigate the game landscape, strategically deploy power-ups, and overcome ticking clock challenges, you unlock the enthralling, unseen layers of the stars' private lives.

name: Celestian Tales: Realms Beyond
summary: An RPG with turn-based combat and a story of questionable morals seen through multiple perspectives.

name: Cellar
summary: A story-focused game about six strangers stuck together for a month, and a machine that must be kept running.

name: Ceaseless Night
summary: Ceaseless Night is a strategic roguelike that captures the essence of dungeon crawling in a bleak world. In a world of stolen sunlight, the flickering flames of a campfire lure unwitting travelers to face the dungeons below. Conquer the dungeons, defeat the Lich King, and end this Ceaseless Night!

name: Cell Machine
summary:
Arrange cells. Build machines. Destroy enemies.

Each cell on its own has a simple function, like moving or spawning other cells. But when combined, more interesting behavior emerges...

name: Celeste Witch
summary:
Celeste Witch is an artistic shoot-em-up game with an emphasis on beautiful visuals, and challenging level design. Pick one of several witches or their companions and shoot your way through dozens of levels; each with their own theme and capped off with a unique boss fight.

This game is a love letter to the kinds of games we played growing up. Games with charming visuals, quirky music, and addicting gameplay that will keep you coming back time and time again.

name: Centipede
summary: The Game Boy port of the 1981 original has features enhancements for the Super Game Boy.

name: Cell to Singularity: Evolution
summary:
Tap into the extraordinary tale of evolution in this cosmic clicker game!
Once upon a time, over 4.5 billion years ago, there was no life in the Solar System. And then, almost in the blink of an eye on the geologic time scale, everything changed. Deep in the primordial soup on Earth lay the organic compounds that would give rise to life’s humble origins. All it takes for this epic evolution game to unfold is you.
Turn to the next page of evolution with every click. Gain entropy to unlock the next chapter of the evolution of life. Uncover twists and turns that led to the great milestones of life evolution: the extinction of the dinosaurs, the discovery of fire, the Industrial Revolution, and more. See chapters that have yet to be written -- a future evolution beyond the modern day.

name: Century of Anticipation
summary: Locked away at home, time slows to a crawl, your only company is yourself. In this short adventure, your challenge might be the toughest of all: make time pass again!

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Dark Goliath Pack
summary:
Elevate yourself to the ranks of a warlord and ride into battle with a full-blown beast-of-a-bundle!

This pack includes all the content of the Mighty Beast Pack with extra rewards.

Full content:
1 Dragon Windguard Epic
1 Dragon Marauder Epic
3 Legendary Helmets
2 Epic Shields
1 Rare Shield
2,200 Gems
A 14-day XP Booster
2 Legendary Banners
2 Legendary Titles
2 Legendary Player Icons
2 Legendary Backgrounds

name: Celestial Crowns
summary: The King is dead! Take the throne in this choice-rich fantasy game and save your Kingdom by reviving ancient magic that's been lost to your family for generations. Customize your character and play through three different romantic routes!

name: Celestial Hacker Girl Jessica
summary: A surreal 3D platformer about a marble girl named Jessica. Roll around, explore the multiverse, hack computers, dodge lasers, and eat cake!

name: Cereal Cafe
summary:
You play as the coolest cereal cafe server you've ever seen in your entire life. Handsome, too! People walk up to the bar, have a seat, order a specific cereal and you have to get it to them before their timer runs out; three strikes and you're fired!

Cereal Cafe is a Rigg'd Game variant of Beerslinger used with license from Second Dimension.

name: Cellitaire
summary: Solitaire meets Cellular automaton in this addictive game that requires both observation and strategy.

name: CellFactor: Psychokinetic Wars
summary: A downloadable FPS from developer Timeline Interactive in which players utilize psi-powers to kill their opponents.

name: Celaria
summary: Celaria is a first-person racing parkour platformer in which the player races against the time on various tracks. Find the fastest path to the goal and take advantage of the enviroment in order to improve your runs as much as possible.

name: Celestials Door
summary: Celestial's Door is a psychological horror game where you, as a desperate husband, search for your missing wife, Dee.

name: Cerberus Corporation: Red Room
summary: Prepare to Escape from the Heart of Darkness. Trapped in Cerberus Corporation's facilities , use wit and instinct to survive a ruthless maze where death is sold. Screams behind walls, cold camera lenses, humanity vanishing under the shadow of wealth… Uncover the truth. Or perish with it

name: Cestos
summary: This article is about the History Great Empires: Rome game.

name: Celestis
summary: Celestis is a real-time strategy game where the goal is to take control of the procedural galaxy by capturing stars.

name: Cerulean
summary: A short visual novel about home and friendship.

name: Cemetery Mary
summary: A story about a girl who loves the cemetery. When her parents go missing, she receives a mysterious text...

name: Celestia
summary: Celestia is a solo-developed indie game. An angelic bullet-hell shoot-'em-up where you defeat enemies throughout the skies, and relax on a floating island with your companions.

name: Cel Damage HD
summary: A HD reimagining of the 2001 cartoon car combat game for Xbox, Gamecube and PS2.

name: Cellyon: Boss Confrontation
summary:
Cellyon: Boss Confrontation is a multiplayer online co-operative game (or MOCO) that brings boss fights to the competitive scene.

How? A group of up to 4 players, custom character abilities and challenging battles against deadly bosses where you will have to be strategic and quick to react.

name: Cellfish
summary: Collect food to evolve and fight for your life against enemy cells in this deep underwater, survivor-like, roguelite experience. Unlock parts to customize your character and become your own unique cell.

name: Cell of Empireo: Isoi Sanemitsu no Records
Celestial Ascend
summary: Ascend through serene skies, guiding a lone traveler across floating realms to discover a hopeful second chance.

name: Celestial Crossing
summary:
Would you get along with your game character?

Do you think you would get along? Would you like each other? Or would you not stand the sight of each other?
Find out in this visual novel!

name: Cecelia
summary: A mysterious island. A giant baby made of stone awakens. Learn to trust each other if you want to explore the perilous terrain, seeking answers from the island's enigmatic call and an ominous force awaiting you in the distant lighthouse.

name: Cell Wars
summary: Cell Wars is a classic arcade shooter where your goal is to consume all enemy cells by shooting and eating them. Inspired by NES graphics, gameplay from arcade 80s cabinets, and early 2000s skill tree systems. Unlock abilities and skills to survive waves of regular, elite and boss cells.

name: Ceres
summary: Beautiful ladies are waiting for you in the blockbuster world!

name: Cendovia Uprising
summary: A sci-fi turn-based strategy game where you battle to conquer Cendovia. Choose your faction and combat style. Grow your army as you expand your territory. Customize your decks for each encounter as you adapt to the ever changing terrain. Put your troops to work or bring them into battle.

name: Celephaïs Dead Cities
summary: Multiplayer survival game in a long dead world.Explore the sunken horrors in your sea vessel while carefully choosing where to anchor and explore the wasteland on foot... NO NPC, All encountered survivors are other players. No leveling, no grinding, just PVP, PVE, with looter and survival elements.

name: Cetetorius
summary: This is a first-person action RPG where you are free to do whatever you want. Turn off the road, start the adventure! The world is open to exploration. Explore the lands of the kingdom, look for unique artifacts, create many objects with a simple crafting system and become part of an amazing world!

name: Celestial Decks
summary: A noncombat strategic deckbuilder with a gentler aesthetic. Players make decks of 15 cards, play cards to a shared story, and earn points to win 5 rounds before their opponent.

name: Central Bank
summary: Take control of the most fearsome weapon known to mankind: the key interest rate. As head of the central bank, you wield the power to make (or break) nations. Raise it, and watch markets crumble and riots erupt. Lower it, and brace yourself for an economy so hot it could melt steel.

name: Central Bank
summary: Take control of the most fearsome weapon known to mankind: the key interest rate. As head of the central bank, you wield the power to make (or break) nations. Raise it, and watch markets crumble and riots erupt. Lower it, and brace yourself for an economy so hot it could melt steel.

name: Century: Wishbringer Pack
summary:
"One of them was sought above all others by man, as it had the power to reshape reality itself.”

This pack includes:
- Mythic Nimblewyrm Dragon: Gai'shor, the Wishbringer
- 1000 Gems
- 14-Days XP Booster

name: Ceaseless
summary: Create, Customize, and Command each module on your starship, explore ceaseless space filled with unique environments, and battle endless combinations of enemies in timed, turn-based combat.

name: Celestial Fall
summary: Celestial Fall is an intense blend of fast-paced combat and identity-based deduction. You are sent to stop a deadly infection from spreading across a corrupted land, but traitors have infiltrated your team. With the Blood Moon rising, can you escape from this place under the conspiracy?

name: Centipede Gun
summary: Centipede Gun is a roguelite autobattler where you create bizzare creatures to face hordes of enemies! Combine different guns, modules and skills to make unique synergies and upgrade your cute little destruction machine!

name: Celestial Wardens
summary: Celestial Wardens is a sci-fi tower defense game where you command a lone spaceship to defend a planet under siege. Survive waves of enemies, build turrets, upgrade your ship, and manage your planet to prevent total annihilation.

name: Celler
summary: Design your own single-celled organism and dive into a vast microscopic world. Eat, fight, and unlock upgrades to survive the dangerous microcosm.

name: Cerebral Clash
summary: Cerebral Clash is a multiplayer arcade shooter where you take control of a tank powered by an enigmatic sentient brain. Play solo in an intriguing campaign or battle online with friends and foes in thrilling warfare matches!

name: Celia's Stupid Romhack
summary: Celia's Stupid Romhack is a comedy puzzle romhack of Pokémon FireRed, designed for everyone who loves Pokémon!. Enjoy a cavalcade of hilarity, nonsense, and fun! Grab some friends and sit around and enjoy the show together! Every line of dialogue is quirky and fun, and every Pokémon has been changed in some way.

name: Centum
summary: An unreliable narrative-driven adventure game. You are trapped, and you must escape. But is that really the goal?

name: Celeste Classic
summary:
An unofficial port of Celeste Classic from PICO-8 to Playdate. Celeste Classic on Playdate was made to be as faithful as possible to the original game on PICO-8. But here are a few notable changes:

The game is in black and white only. A lot of visual elements have an outline to make them more readable. But this does not impact their original hitbox.

The game is rendered at 256×240 from the original 128×128. Four pixel lines are cropped at the top and bottom of the screen. The game can be played at its original resolution by disabling the Fullscreen option available in the game’s menu.

Assist mode is available under the game’s menu. This allows players to skip a level, change the game speed to 0.5×, get infinite dashes, and enable invincibility. If assist mode is used during a run, a mention is added on each level in the lower right corner, as well as in the pause screen and the final score screen.

name: Cellveillance
summary: "Cellveillance" is a detective drama entertainment product, you will visit the apartment every day, and the entire apartment is responsible for everything that happens in the apartment, a mysterious organization asks you to return the information of the residents.

name: Celebrity Sports Showdown
summary:
A Sports Showdown with the Stars

Celebrity Sports Showdown brings the thrill of your favorite recreational sports activities right into your living room. Compete head-to-head in 12 games with celebrity musicians and athletes to see who's got the goods. With intuitive Wii Remote controls and a variety of multi-player tournaments, this fun-filled competition separates the celebrities from the wannabes!

name: Cells & Serpents
summary: Cells & Serpents is a roleplaying game. The player explores a series of unending randomized dungeon rooms fighting monsters and looking for treasure. At any time the player can choose to move left, right, or forwards. These can take the player to stairs up, stairs down, a blank wall, corridors, rooms, or doors. The player can not move beyond level 1, but as they move lower they encounter harder enemies and acquire greater treasure. Blank walls damage the player, and corridors present more movement options. Doors allow movement into rooms, and the player can listen at the door for clues prior to entering. Treasure contains gold, but sometimes contains armor and scrolls which make the player more powerful. When encountering an enemy, the player can choose to zap it with their limited spells to weaken the monster before attacking. In combat the player receives a randomized amount of damage, and if hit points reach 0 it's game over. The player receives a final score based upon levels cleared and monsters defeated.

name: Celtique
summary: Multiplayer stealth game set in a dream!

name: Cells
summary: СELLS tile matching game is happy to take you to a wonderful matching-game world. Welcome on board with us. Ahead of you is a wide range of matching puzzle games and tile link adventures. There is nothing better than training your memory, attention, and chill with our matching games for adults.

name: Celestial Visitor
summary: No longer just defending against monster attacks - survival now demands offensive action. Assemble an elite expedition to subjugate the monstrous hordes, and you'll take the role of a warrior in this crusade.

name: Cellar
summary: Short arcade game with handcrafted pixel art graphics. You play as Lily who traverses the dark corners of the basement under her house in search of her lost teddy bear. Inspired by some of the greatest fears from our childhood.

name: Cellular Harvest
summary: A lo-fi game about photographing aliens so that your employers can turn them into toothpaste. Explore. Photograph. Catalog. Harvest.

name: Century: Age of Ashes
summary: Century: Age of Ashes is a free-to-play multiplayer dragon battle game. Master a growing roster of classes and dragons, compete in intense arena battles and rule the skies in fast-paced aerial combats.

name: Centauri Sector
summary: Centauri Sector is a top down tactical space combat game powered by a dynamic turn based campaign, rpg elements, fleet management and ground base combat.

name: Centauri Dominion
summary: Centauri Dominion is a top down space shooter set in the Centauri sector where a new colony is being established. There are others arriving seeking to dominate the sector for themselves and will not take no for an answer.

name: Cemetery Warrior 7 Boss Rush
summary: Cemetery Warrior 7 Boss Rush. It is a hardcore 3D Shooter from the first person, where you have to defeat 11 strongest bosses!

name: Ceiling Mounted Sprinkler
summary: This mod adds a ceiling mounted water sprinkler that is meant to match futuristic style builds. It covers 8-10 blocks and constantly waters.

name: Celestian Tales: Old North
summary: Celestian Tales: Old North is a refreshing take on the classic turn-based Japanese style RPG, where your decisions in its dark and gritty storyline shape the world of tomorrow. When the future comes at last, is it what you hoped for?

name: Cell Sword
summary:
It is the future. Video games are dead.

War has left the world polluted with microscopic autonomous robots. These drones enter the bloodstream and consume the organs and life-force of their host.

This deadly disease is known as RUST.

Instead of games, players are hired by the rich to remotely pilot fast nano ships to blast the Rust.

These guns-for-hire are called Cell Swords.

name: Celestial Ascent
summary: A safe-for-work visual novel set in the near future. Featuring four protagonists, the group uncovers the past and fights against an inevitable future.

name: Celestial Golf
summary: Hit your ball on orbital trajectories around a realistically sized solar system. Discover the secrets hidden in the planets and moons, learn orbital mechanics, and boldly go where no golf ball has gone before.

name: Cel by Date!
summary: An age-gap romantic comedy between two women having a rough night at an anime convention.

name: Cemetery Defence
summary: Cemetery Defense is a tower defense game. Your task is to prevent the destruction of the barrier wall by installing towers and improving them for greater combat effectiveness. The number of enemy forces will only grow, but the tactical advantage will be upgrades to your towers and walls.

name: Cease To Breathe
summary: Cease to Breathe is retro-inspired adventure heavily influenced by the Commodore Amiga games of the late 1980's / early 90's.

name: Celesteia
summary: Celesteia is a 2D sandbox game that is currently in development.

name: Century of Steam
summary: Century of Steam is a physics-based multiplayer railroad simulator and strategy game. Build your route through beautiful landscapes, customize and operate your fleet of historic trains, discover the sights, sounds, and stories of railroading with industry-leading steam, firing, and audio simulation.

name: Cerulean Invasion
summary: Cerulean Invasion is an engaging BL / Yaoi / Gay / Bara / Queer / NSFW (18+) visual novel featuring space cadets and enticing romance. Follow our characters as they embrace their sexuality and explore their newfound romance.

name: Cedric & Odious
summary: Battle through a dark fantasy world as a resurrected warrior king. Once loyal friends, you now serve at the mercy of Odious, a brilliant but corrupt sorcerer. Master tactical combat and magical artifacts in this challenging action RPG.

name: Cecil Run
summary: Arrows fall randomly on Cecil as he continues to run away from danger avoiding pits and gaps while collecting meat and treasure. Survive long enough and the dentist will become agitated, get into his B-52 and bomb Cecil like the Dresden Cathedral. Once Cecil collects 10 pieces of meat, the hamburger will drop.

name: Ceville
summary: Be the lesser of two evils in this tongue-and-cheek sendup of the fantasy genre. Point and click your way back into royalty as the vertically challenged (and recently deposed) despot Ceville.

name: Center Mass: Streets of Ramadi
summary: Experience a faithful and authentic sniper simulation. Step into the boots of an elite SEAL sniper, mastering precision, stealth, and tactics. Featuring realistic weapon handling, intense missions inspired by real events, and cooperative gameplay for unparalleled immersion.

name: Celadon
summary: A tightly designed, precision platformer with a large variety of mechanics. Jump, dash and teleport your way past spikes to get to the end. Use multiple move sets over seven chapters. For players of all skill levels to enjoy!

name: CELL 0: Cyber Entertainment Leisure Lounge
summary: CELL is a short non-linear visual novel in a post-apocalypse/cyberpunk setting. Kenzo is an artificially grown human who lived his entire life alone isolated with a sweet, but artificial service intelligence. He's not okay. Help him to go through the disturbing situation he's about to get into.

name: Center Station Simulator
summary: Inherit an abandoned shopping center. Make it functional and produce many products yourself in your underground laboratory! Get rich by selling them to your customers. Develop and expand your center with many features!

name: Cepheus Protocol
summary: Find patient zero before an alien virus takes over San Francisco and the cepheus protocol is enacted. Command your squad, save civilians, and stop the Pangu virus. Kill patient zero and save the world.

name: Cereal Reaper
summary: Cereal Reaper is a top-down turn-based RPG with a heavy focus on exploration. Talk and fight your way into finding the greatest breakfast item of all time.

name: Celestial Fall
summary: A surreal 3D platformer with beauty, depth & exploration.

name: Celestial Command
summary:
Celestial Command is a realistic sandbox space game which unites real space flight, real orbital mechanics, and all the fun of classic space action games.
We want to show how games about space actually should look, without silly vacuum friction and the maximum speed limit. As in the real world, everything in this game is in continuous motion in orbit.Realistic Orbital Mechanic

name: Cecconoid
summary: Cecconoid is an 8-bit inspired, flick-screen, twin-stick-shooter, set in an alternate dimension where the pixels are still chunky, and the bad guys are black and white. Except for their red dangly bits...

name: Cepheus Protocol: Free Vehicle Camo Post Modern Collection
summary: We are thrilled to unveil the Post-Modern Camouflage Pack: a set of three unique patterns - Desert Sand, Forest Green, and Snow. What's even better? This downloadable content (DLC) is completely free for all players who wish to acquire it.

name: Ceiba
summary: Ein, a simple-hearted member of an expedition sent by mankind to distant planets, tries to get romantic with a pretty but cold co-worker girl. Unfortunately, he is not the only one trying to make contact as from the abandoned and desolate alien ruins, the girl receives a message in human language.

name: Centipede
summary: Centipede is a vertically-oriented shoot 'em up arcade game produced by Atari, Inc. in 1980. The game was designed by Ed Logg along with Dona Bailey, one of the few female game programmers in the industry at this time. It was also the first arcade coin-operated game to have a significant female player base. The player defends against swarms of insects, completing a round after eliminating the centipede that winds down the playing field.

name: Centipede
summary: Enter the world of the Wee People and do your best to save them from the QueenPede, who will stop at nothing to destroy this peaceful race of humanoids. In this remake of the classic Atari game, players take the role of Wally, the village's humble bean counter, as he is quickly recruited to man the village bug shooter and sent off to save the colony from the ruthless QueenPede and her destructive subjects -- the spiders, scorpions, and fleas -- as she sets out to conquer the peaceful wee people. Work your way through all-new 3D worlds with new weapons and skills. And if you're really good, you might just discover the original Centipede.

name: Centauri Dark
summary: Centauri Dark is a bullet-hell FPS where you fight against wave after wave of mechs in a bid for your own survival.

name: Celestia: Chain of Fate

name: Cellings
summary: Cellings is a creative sandbox game taking place in an abstract procedural world full of various species. Experience the full evolution of cells across 3 generations, compete with other species, and explore breathtaking worlds.

name: Center Court
summary: A 4-player tennis game created by SEGA.

name: C'est pas Sorcier: Menace sur le Volcan Tamakou
summary: C'est pas Sorcier: Menace sur le Volcan Tamakou is an edutainment game featuring Fred and Jamy, hosts of the show on France 3. The title is also intended as an adventure game, to discover geology and archeology on the island of Malocoto located in Melanesia.

name: Cell Hacker
summary: A cellular automaton-like MMO game based on text terminals. Players will write unique cell reproduction logic and place cells in the vast cell world to grow, reproduce, compete, cooperate with other players' cells, and write their own species history.

name: Celestial
summary:
Celestial is an indie puzzle RPG with a science fiction theme. Discover and begin to understand that this world is not what it seems by exploring the world around you, solving ancient and forgotten puzzles, and finding and activating dormant runestones.

Are you ready to uncover the secret?

name: Centifeed
summary: Collect orbs, upgrade, and crush your enemies in this indie-action game!

name: Celestial Rune Consortium: Shadows of Ascension
summary: You can achieve the goals set by the Consortium in several ways, whether you prefer to take a more aggressive approach or opt for stealth. Improve your character traits through skills that you can learn. But be warned, others may seek to contest your extraction efforts.

name: Cellar: Rags and Knife
summary: Adventure game based on a real life story! Get a knife, put on rags and go down!

name: Celestial Links
summary: The orange star must hit the red target to advance to the next level. To achieve this, release the blue and orange stars by selecting them.

name: Ceremonial Speedmaps
summary: 13 SP maps inspired by Ceremonial Circles.

name: Centurion Rex
summary: Command legions of dinosaur-riding roman riflemen in this historically accurate RTS.

name: Ceasing to be Her Demise
summary: An interactive short story in the form of a point-and-click adventure game. The third and the final episode of the "Fragments of Being Her Demise" trilogy.

name: Celebrity Life
summary: Happiness, success, fortune, fame, drama, scandals, and downfall. In Celebrity Life you'll experience them all. Take a journey through an immersive reflection of the peoples' lives we follow & talk about. The Celebrities! Now at last you can become one. Don't dream your life, live your dream.

name: Centipede
summary: MGA LCD handheld port of Centipede.

name: Celestial
summary: Celestial is a 2D indie platformer where you collect items against time.

name: Cepheus Protocol: Project Fenrir
summary: In Cepheus Protocol Project Fenrir, players battle relentless zombie waves as elite Fenrir operatives, mastering Arcade Time Attacks and intense Horde Defense Missions with strategic weaponry and tactics. Dive into exhilarating chaos.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Ravager Edition
summary: Far atop the frozen Valkürian Range lives a tribe known for their capacity to call the elements. Some fear their ravaging strength, but few know their true name.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Bloodshed Edition
summary:
The Bloodshed Edition includes the full game Century: Age of Ashes and extra rewards:
- Sacrificial Stone Dragon
- Bloodshed Armor Set

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Rimeblood Premium Edition
Celestia Ultimate
summary: Collect, train, and battle with Champions in this RPG built on Unreal Engine 5.

name: Cell: Idle Factory Incremental
summary: CIFI is a complex incremental idle game with more than meets the eyes. Here, you'll build, grow and upgrade a star fleet of industry & production based ships. The goal is to produce as many cells as possible! Thousands of upgrades await to help you in this particular endeavor!

name: Celerity
summary: A Platformer FPS where you gun allow you to teleport

name: Cerulean Days
summary: On a seemingly idyllic island, the Internet is shut down. What will become of those unable to adapt? In 2018, a lethal biological attack claims a significant number of lives. While tragedy occupies people's minds to the brim, a controlling governmental plan is put into effect.

name: Celebrities Hacked: NoirPetal Photo Pack
summary: NoirPetal, a successful fashion house owner and perfume creator, has become an inspirational figure for millions. From a determined child with a chemistry set, she's built a fashion empire, with styles seamlessly merging classic and modern trends.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Fellow Edition
summary: Stand out from the crowd with the Fellow Pack - an epic heap of dragons, customisations and consumables fit for every true dragoneer who want to leave their mark in the history of Century: Age of Ashes.

name: Cedric and the Revolution
summary: A 2D point-and-click adventure game.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Elite Sentry Edition
summary: Military cadets training under the Skeld banner often dream of one day joining the ranks of the Elite Sentry division, a group of fearless Windguards considered as heroes of the Kingdom. If only they kew about the dark deeds they committed during the War of the Meadows…

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Mighty Beast Pack
summary: Set out on your adventure with the perfect set of rewards. Toothier than a the average backpack, this bundle is surely the best for every new dargoneer in town!

name: Cellular Harvest: Purple
summary:
At the edge of explored space, your camera will decide the fate of a world.

Cellular Harvest: Purple is a shortform first-person photography exploration game. You are an Auditor. An AI embedded in your suit evaluates the value of every being you encounter for the corporate interests that direct humanity's journey into a wider universe.

Track alien creatures. Catalog their existence with your camera. Follow orders. And enjoy an alien planet - while it's still intact.

This game is a companion piece to Cellular Harvest: Green, which takes place during the morning.

name: Cepheus Protocol: Support Pack Vehicle Camo Classic Wars Collection
summary: Experience the intensity of some of the bloodiest American wars from the twentieth century with Vehicle Camo Pack #2. Immerse yourself in the history of the Second World War, Vietnam, and the Gulf War through camo designs that faithfully represent each conflict.

name: Cerbirds
summary: Help Rickie, Pepper and Cutie to find thee fruits!

name: Celtic Warfare
summary: Celtic Warfare is an unique deckbuilder where you take up your weapons and fight the magically enchanted board. Through proper countering and combo's you defeat enemies and raid land, defeat it's king and reap all the rewards, improve you cards further take on harder raids.

name: Cement Mixer Simulator 2003
summary: A cement mixing exploration game.

name: Cell Defender
summary: Four warriors take risks in the human body. They will encounter many enemies from outside, including bacteria, viruses, fungi, parasites and so on. They will also face infected cells and cancer cells. Finally, they will strive to wipe out the enemy and usher in victory.

name: Cemantle & Pedantle
summary:
Daily word games that can be played solo or collaboratively in a team and gives players a daily ranking.
In Cemantle, players have to find a secret word by trying to get as close as possible in its semantic field.
In Pedantle, players must uncover a Wikipedia page by guessing each word of its intro following the same tules as cémantix.

name: CEO City
summary:
CEO City is the Edutainment game which intend to support and provide players learning of current CEO Governor"s obligation comparing with the previous general governors that how different they are. Besides, it is the game which can increase and develop management skill as players were CEO themselves and have to manage their good province for their citizen satisfaction. This will judge whether they could be voted to be the CEO again for next election or not.

Not only supporting learning of CEO, but also a tool to encourage the OTOP by setting OTOP as a part of management stipulation which CEO have to distribute for their province highest utility.

name: Centipede & Millipede
summary: In one of the most beloved arcade games of all times, players must destroy the Centipede as it moves faster and faster through a colorful mushroom field. Try your hand at this classic arcade game in its original form and completely re-stylized versions featuring evolved graphics and gameplay.

name: Cendric
summary: Cendric combines RPG and Platformer elements in one game, featuring both a sidescroller and top-down view. The player follows the story of a boy with no memory and discovers the magical but dangerous world of Admantris.

name: C'est pas Sorcier: Mystérieuse Disparition en Amazonie
summary: C'est pas Sorcier: Mystérieuse Disparition en Amazonie is an adventure game. A photographer wanting to save the Amazon has disappeared - kidnapped by traffickers. Team up with Fred and Jamy and use science to try to save him. Investigate this mysterious disappearance in the heart of the Amazon rainforest and progress with the famous tandem to overcome the adventure!

name: Celebrity Darling
summary:
When you jump head first into the entertainment industry to make your dreams come true, what do you find waiting for you?

A life-changing, non-stop scandal with the hottest boys in the business!
Your turbulent life in the industry is filled with trials - but what will be the future of your scandalous romance?

A popstar, an actress, a singer… decide which path you’ll take, and aim for the top!

name: CEO
summary: Play the CEO of a multi-national conglomerate in this business simulation. Grow crops, raise livestock, build mines and oil wells to get the raw resources needed to make more than 75 types of consumer goods.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Arisen Pack
summary:
Rise to the top in no time with the Arisen Pack - a best-value bundle filled with high tier rewards and a whole month's worth of Bonus XP. It's the perfect treat to thrust yourself to mastery!

This pack includes all the content of the Zealot Pack DLC with extra rewards.

Full content of this DLC:
- A Legendary Dragon Skin for the Phantom
- An Epic Dragon Skin for the Windguard
- An Epic Dragon Skin for the Marauder
- 3,000 Gems
- A full epic outfit for the Phantom
- A Legendary helmet for the Windguard
- A Legendary helmet for the Marauder
- An Epic weapon for the Windguard
- An Epic weapon for the Marauder
- A 30-day xp booster
- 3 banners, player titles, profile wallpapers and player icons

name: Center of Gravity
summary: Destroy asteroids and run up the score against your friends in COG (Center of Gravity), a stunning VR homage to the classic arcade game, Asteroids. Rift and Vive controllers supported.

name: Celsius
summary: The game Celsius takes place in a distant galaxy. The player is assigned the role of the pilot of one of the warring parties.

name: CEO
summary: Use your rifle and granade launcher to destroy the evil that has posessed your employees

name: Celebrating Pizza
summary: This pizza puzzle game features a few of the most beloved pizza toppings from all over the world and challenges you to slice based on the type of pizza ordered. But keep a close eye on the requested toppings and number of slices—the more accurate the order, the more stars you earn!

name: Celestial Impact
summary: Celestial Impact is a multiplayer shooter game.

name: Cerebrawl
summary: A fighting game from the minds at Zero Dimension. 2v2 tag team 2D fighter w/stage breaks and assists.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Strength of Jaarlandt Edition
summary: The Strength of Jaarlandt Edition includes the full game Century: Age of Ashes and extra rewards.

name: Celestial Soul
summary:
Celestial Soul is a 2D game about anthropomorphic fox who's found himself in the middle of somewhere??

He's on a quest in the Void to retrieve the lost shards of his SOUL, which was shattered by his clumsy new friend.

name: Cellbit Simulator
summary:
This game is a Cellbit simulator based on the "Life Simulator" game. In it you are the Cellbit and your goal is to become the LARGEST YOUTUBER IN THE WORLD (getting more subscribers than the PewDiePie). 
Hope you like it. 
As this is my first game and I never programmed it before, the game may be a little bad and with bugs, I ask you to leave comments saying if you liked it or not and what can improve.

name: Centrist
summary: Small tetris type game where your goal is to place block around center piece in perfect rectangle formation. Blocks will appear from 4 different direction.

name: Celestwald Adventure
summary: Solve captivating quests and puzzles in this hand-drawn point-and-click game.

name: Centipede
summary: The Game Boy Color port of the Centipede remake.

name: Cellings
summary: Experience the full evolution of cells across 3 generations and explore breathtaking worlds.

name: Cerita Jabar Sangkuriang
summary: Sangkuriang West Java Folklore

name: Cendrillon palikA
summary: A visual novel for Nintendo Switch.

name: Cefore
summary: CEFORE is a physics-based puzzler in an abstract simplistic art style in which you get contracted to bring down different structures in the most creative ways possible. Try not to cause too much destruction, of course.

name: Celestial Project
summary: "Celestial Project" is a Roguelike WarChess game. It is the first game of the story "Celestial". Command the special operations forces, resist and study unknown alien creatures from space, defend the five star ship civilization spacecraft under construction on earth, and retain human kindling!

name: Celestial Hearts
summary: An indie yuri jRPG featuring the story of heartbroken elf Kayah and Helen, a fallen angel seeking her life's purpose.

name: CellFactor: Revolution
summary: CellFactor: Revolution is a tech demo based physics game that was eventually released for free.

name: Centipede
summary: Port of Centipede for the Intellivision.

name: Cellyon: Boss Maker
summary: Cellyon: Boss Maker gives you the possibility to invent from A to Z the class which the players will use for your fight.

name: Celebrity Hunter
summary: The most ambitious indie adult VN with 70+ hours of gameplay! Live your hottest fantasies with 9 main characters (and dozens of others) in 3,500+ 4k scenes. Create your cinematic story with 2,100+ impactful choices and over 30 endings! After 3 mi downloads in Brazil, CH comes to seduce you!

name: Centipede
summary: A port of Centipede for the Tiger Game.com.

name: Cerulean Tears
summary: A vanilla style map map made by FifthElephant and will take 5-10 minutes to complete.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Colossus Deluxe Pack
summary:
Unleash bestial power with a loaded heap of rewards. The high quality items included in this best-value pack will make your enemies shiver!!

This pack includes all the content of the Mighty Beast Pack + Dark Goliath Pack with extra rewards.

Full content:
An Adventurer Pack Code (to gift a friend)
1 Dragon Windguard Epic
1 Dragon Marauder Epic
1 Dragon Phantom Legendary
3 Legendary Weapons
3 Legendary Helmets
2 Epic Shields
1 Rare Shield
3,500 Gems
A 30-day XP Booster
3 Legendary Banners
3 Legendary Titles
3 Legendary Player Icons
3 Legendary Backgrounds

name: Cessate il Fuoco/Heathcliff
summary: A digital simulator of the handheld of the same name.

name: Centipulp
summary: A very inspired from 80's Centipede arcade game like for playdate made with Pulp

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Thornweaver Premium Pack
summary:
Unlock the “Thornweaver” rider class with its new dragon and summon the elder forces of nature! The pack also includes two extra dragons, legendary gear, themed customisations, a hefty XP bonus and gems.

Full content of this pack:
Thornweaver Class
2 Epic Dragons (Thornweaver)
Legendary Weapon (Thornweaver)
Legendary Helmet (Thornweaver)
Themed Wallpaper
Themed Player Icon
30 Days Bonus XP
1000 Gems

name: Celente Immortal
summary: An Action-RPG game where you can recruit characters from all over the world as you go on adventures and explore new areas.

name: Cerberus
summary: After learning the location of the alien homeworld. Duke is drawn off course by a distress call from Cerberus station, an enormous deep space platform watching over a nearby darkmatter nebula. His ship is ambushed by several alien fighters which he destroys but at a heavy cost. He must now dock with Cerberus both to find out what happened to it and repair his ship (or secure another one).

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Frost Heir Edition
summary: Worn by the chosen herald of Vahlmir, this armor is imbued with the power of the Winter's Wrath. Anyone who stands in the warrior's way will meet their end in a torrent of ice and fire.

name: Ceremonial Circles
summary: Ceremonial Circles is a Large Vertical Wizard map made by CZG. This singular, yet large map totals an average of half an hour for experienced players.

name: Centaurus
summary: A medium sized base map made with the progs dump devkit.

name: Centipede
summary: Port of Centipede for the Texas Instruments TI-99/4A.

name: Ceplion
summary: Unique platforming mechanics with detailed enemy patterns and combat skills. Explore the Ceplion Island and Uncover the dark truth about its people.

name: Celestian Tales
summary: Celestian Tales is a beautifully hand-painted JRPG set in a world of questionable morals where opposing views clash, with no clear right or wrong.

name: Cemetary
summary: One huge map

name: Centipede
summary: Atari 5200 port of Centipede.

name: Celtreos
summary: 1-2 players, game controller support. NO in-app purchases. >30 minutes of music! 9 detailed stages, partly-random, with bosses. Tons of weapons, guards & special moves. Play in a window or in Full Screen.

name: Celeste: The D-Sides Pack
summary:
The Resolutive Dance of Madeline and Monika.

The complete D-Side series all in one big map pack!~
The D-Sides are very hard versions of the base game's chapters, building on them but also adding new ideas.

name: Centropods
summary: Centropods is a Centipede clone for the C64.

name: Celtabula
summary: Celtabula is a Celtic-style puzzle game with imitation board game, where each level has many solutions. Think: if you can not go through the level for a long time, maybe you should try a different approach?

name: CellBreach
summary: 2D free puzzle online maze cube game thats a platformer MULTIPLAYER

name: Cecile
summary: One night, when the moon is full, four sisters enjoying a carefree life are summoned to an old castle by their mother. Waiting for them is a "ceremony" which will turn them into witches. Due to the ulterior motives of their mother, the four sisters are stripped of what they cherish most.

name: Centipede & Battlezone
summary: Centipede & Battlezone is a mini-CD dual pack with two original coin-operated classic video games.

name: Central Limit Theorem
summary:
Central Limit Theorem is a survival shooter where you have to protect your core for as long as you can from the shapes attacking it. It's a quick, simple, stressful, high-score shooter designed to be played between other, more substantial games. 
 
Each enemy starts with a unique behaviour (they can shoot, weave, or orbit) and they each leave a different coloured ink on the playfield. When another enemy crosses this ink later it will learn the behaviours of those that went before! 
The more ink, the more difficult the game becomes!

name: Centre Court Tennis
summary: The basic game features a multiplayer mode (up to 4 players), a tournament mode and an exhibition mode. You also have four mini-games, "Tennis Court Bingo", "Burning Barrels", "Run and Gun" & Knock'em Down", where your goal is to hit certain objects in the tennis field. You can win special prices for getting enough points.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Easternvard Renaissance Edition
summary: The Easternvard Overseers established their reputation by saving the entire queen's guard from an ill-fated ambush.

name: Cemetery Warrior 3
summary: Cemetery Warrior 3 is a dynamic and exciting 3D first-person shooter with great graphics, lots of weapons and various monsters. You will explore an ancient monastery and its dungeons.

name: Cepheus Protocol Anthology
summary: Experience the outbreak of the Pangu Virus from multiple perspectives across as the brave heroes of the Center for Epidemic Research and Control battle tirelessly to stop the spread of a cataclysmic alien virus that has mutated innocent people into monstrous creatures of unimaginable power

name: Cento
summary: CENTO is a game where you enter commands in time with music and activate skills to fight. Collect gifts while reinforcing your skills and fight on stages with a wide variety of songs!

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Mercenary Edition
summary: The Mercenary Edition includes the full game Century: Age of Ashes and extra rewards.

name: Centipede
summary: Port of Centipede for the Apple II computer.

name: Cede
summary: A Strategic Action RPG where players transform wastelands into beautiful utopias through combat farming, burst monsters into seeds becoming vegetation.

name: Centipede
summary: Remaster of Centipede for iOS.

name: Celestial Rescuers 2: Zero Mission
summary: Provide intergalactic humanitarian aid across universes! Fight against space pirates and race against the clock to preserve peace!

name: CEO Tycoon: My Game Studio
summary: Every swipe is a decision, every decision a potential path to glory or downfall. How will you lead?

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Harbinger Edition
summary: Prophecies rise out of thin air from the eternal, channeled through the mind of Harbingers and distilled in chants or tomes - like the Grimoire of Volgïr. Those end up being passed down generations until they finally find their purpose.

name: Celestial Breach
summary:
Celestial Breach is a Coop arcade flight game in a Sci-Fi setting, Focused on team play VS NPC. 
It contains a lots of the old school arcade flight sim components, while being refreshing by focusing on cooperation and adding more exotic weapons, abilities, and GamePlay mechanics.

name: Centipede
summary: An unofficial port of Atari's Centipede made by Jeff Minter in the early years of Llamasoft.

name: Centre Court: Hard Hitter
summary:
Take to centre court as you lob, slice, volley and smash your way to victory! With phenomenal ball physics, silky smooth graphics and addictive gameplay this game serves as an ace past the competition. Play against a friend to experience just how addictive Centre Court: Hard Hitter can be! 
 
Are you a Hard-Hitter? Or will you walk away from the challenge? The ball's in your court.

name: Cell of Empireo
summary:
This is not the beginning of a nightmare, but the end of a peaceful dream.

Haruki Atou, an investigator who works for the Otowa Detective Agency, was entrusted with taking care of his junior, Shinano, who was found with amnesia.
One day, Shinano suddenly disappeared. The last place where his whereabouts was confirmed, it was near the facility of the religious group "Supreme Heaven Research Institute", which Atou was planning to investigate next.
Atou was involved in the terrifying reality of the Supreme Heaven Research Institute, but he soon realized.

He didn't get caught up in it by chance.

Will you enjoy "God's love"?

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Tribal Strife Edition
summary: “Did everyone forget they took children, -OUR CHILDREN-, and turned them against their own kind? It is not something I can forgive.”

name: Ceremony of Innocence
summary: An interactive multimedia 'game' based on Nick Bantock's Griffin and Sabine trilogy of illustrated novels.

name: Centipede
summary: Port of Centipede for Atari 8-bit computers.

name: Center Ring Boxing
summary:
Center Ring Boxing is an unlicensed 3-D polygon boxing game where the player can choose from 30 different male or female boxers and compete in six different weight divisions. They may also create their own boxer and use them to rise through the ranks to become champion choosing from one of five distinct styles of boxing.

There is also a trainer by the name of Snake that will help train the player as they progress thorough the game as well as become a selectable character along with a hidden character in two-player versus mode once the player becomes heavyweight champion. A practice mode also is present that will allow the player to get accustomed to the game's controls and features 12 different camera angles and a replay mode that will the player to view their previous fight in it's entirety.

name: Cerevrum
summary: Cerevrum is a new approach to learning in virtual reality! Using his intelligence, a player steps in conflict of Gods in the world of Enuma. The challenge of the first game - to destroy hordes of enemy's spaceships! In second game player defends Soul Crystals from enemies.

name: Cellosseum
summary: Cellosseum is a bullet heaven following the progress of a lone cell as it battles a variety of enemies on its quest to guide the evolutionary process of life itself. Upgrade your attacks, shields, health, and speed to understand your role in the creation of life on the planet of Ceres Prime.

name: Centipede
summary: An unreleased port of Centipede for the Atari Lynx.

name: Ceaseless
summary: 'Ceaseless' is a top-down action game designed with minimalist pixel graphics, with over 10 playable characters to choose from. Each level is complete with unrelenting enemies, enticing potential items, and a uniquely crafted score. Are you ready to brave the tower?

name: Centurion: Defender of Rome
summary:
The year is 275 B.C. Through conquest and careful diplomacy, the Roman republic has brought the petty kingdoms and city-states of Italia under its control. This is the moment at which the heirs of Romulus and Remus step onto the world stage. This is the humble beginning of an empire that will one day cover most of Europe, Asia Minor, and North Africa.

As an ambitious young officer, you duty is to defend Rome. Your hope is to become Caesar. Your fate - to rule the world.

name: Celeste Strawberry Jam
summary: The Celeste Strawberry Jam Collaboration is a community mod for Celeste featuring 5 difficulty levels for new and experienced players alike, with over a hundred unique levels to play.

name: Centipede
summary: Port of Centipede for the ColecoVision.

name: Cell HD: emergence
summary: Based on a 3D version of mathematician John Conway's "Game of Life," the game puts the player in a biological world that is uncannily alive.

name: Centipede
summary: Port of Centipede for the Commodore 64.

name: Celeros
summary: Introducing Celeros, the future of racing. A world built on risk and reward, brought to life through the competition of racing! The official game of the Airspeeder flying car racing series!

name: Celebrity Deathmatch
summary: Based on MTV's claymation animation show Celebrity Deathmatch. You play a series of wrestling matches, much in the style of other wrestling games. The twist being, that you play one of various celebrities, such as Marilyn Manson and Carmen Electra. Various weapons appear in the ring during play, such as a chainsaw and crossbow. The game is set out in 6 "episodes" of 3 matches each, and you can play either of the celebrities in each match.

name: Cedric and the Lost Sceptre
summary:
Accompany Cedric through 11 huge levels on a hazardous hunt for the missing sceptre.

There are islands to explore, cities to be scoured, a great sea of lava to be crossed and you must also be prepared to survive the sudden onset of Winter...

So, steel yourself for the fight against some fearsome foes and carry the cause of justice to victory!

name: Centipede
summary: Port of Centipede for IBM PC (DOS).

name: CEO Sim: GameDev
summary: CEO Sim: GameDev is an economic simulation game for managing an IT game development company. Take on the role of the head of a young company and develop your project. Implement your business strategy and lead your company to prosperity!

name: Cenk The Chopper
summary: Cenk The Chopper is a fast paced hack-and-slash game. Fight through hordes of mutants and robots in a world you've made go to hell. Chop 'em up everything you see till the end of it.

name: Celestial Tear: Demon's Revenge
summary: Celestial Tear: Demon's Revenge is an episodic RPG set in a sci-fi fantasy world. The game features a unique turn-based combo based combat system inspired by 16-bit fighting games, exciting motion comic cut scenes, and a beautiful world brought to life with 2D pixel art and animations. Discover a rich story with voice acted dialogue, accompanied by a powerful, original soundtrack.

name: Celestial Impact Invasion
summary: First-person Ability Shooter with fast-paced action, bosses, and multiple levels. A meteorite crashes, leaving a powerful resource that others are willing to do anything to obtain, alongside a dangerous creature that arrived with the meteorite. It's up to you to stop them and save the world.

name: Cell Command
summary: TURN-BASED TACTICS meets SNAKE: A new roguelike in the Genome Guardian universe. SPLICE DNA to create new units, enhance their genetics, and take on the Abyss virus once more in a variety of different modes & match types.

name: Cell Raiser
summary: Take care of the body; take care of the antibodies

name: Cecil Hollow
summary: Venture to Cecil Hollow and investigate the strange events that have driven away the previous owners. Cecil Hollow is a sci-fi horror game with a rich atmosphere set in modern day Kentucky.

name: CelV Run
summary: CelV Run is the ultimate multiplayer 1v1 race while the floor is lava. In CelV Run you can challenge any of your friends, or you can challenge a player from anywhere in the world. To win just don't fall into the lava and pass through the platforms as quickly as possible.

name: Celestiais & Dragões
summary: The new 2D Hack and slash based on fantasy medieval times using mechanics inspired by old Beat 'em ups phases games from the Arcade era. It has a lot of adventure, action, magic, mystery, sensational environments and diverse creatures. Try to beat the game and decipher this story.

name: Cellmons
summary:
Cellmons is an innovative multiplayer game, merging rules of collectible card games with role playing game mechanics. Participants connect to the central server through the Internet.
Players can create and evolve Avatars from the world of Cellmons. During the game Avatars gain experience, become stronger and can use increasingly powerful spells. The match between players is based on coming up with your own strategy in attack, defence and choice of spell from the deck, which you have earlier prepared. The one who wins is usually the person who can predict their enemy's moves more accurately. The results of your fights affect your Avatar’s further progress and it’s standings within the Cellmons world hierarchy.

name: Cesspool
summary: Cesspool is a chill, psychedelic and minimalist JRPG in a weird post-apocalyptic world! The game is an accessible, minimalist experience and is about 5 hours for the main story (double for 100%).

name: Celtic Kings: Rage of War
summary:
Julius Caesar wants to expand his already massive empire and he has his sights set on the lush countryside of Gaul. Celtic Kings: Rage of war brings you the excitement of the Roman conquests in two modes: strategic and adventure.

In strategic mode, you play as either the Romans or the Gauls in a world where tactical and strategic maneuveres are the key to victory. In adventure mode you take on the role of Larax and the battle the warring tribes who have raided your village and killed your wife.

Two exciting game modes, one action-packed conquest - let the best warrior win!
